person.persName: John A. Ervin (bradley co. TN, corporal 1st kentucky light artillery )

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Greene County, Tennessee native. Son of Johnathon Ervin and Mary Ervin. Resident in Bradley County, Tennessee, in 1860. Farmer in 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as private and corporal from September 10, 1863. Reported as deserted from Mt. Sterling, Kentucky, on January 2, 1865. Returned to duty in May 1865 and mustered out of service July 26, 1865.
